availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles T. Barton (Pendleton County, Kentucky, shoemaker)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, shoemaker. Kentucky native. Son of William Barton and Mary Thomason Barton. Married to Judith Ann Copindorfan Barton in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on December 27, 1848. Father of Mary E. Barton, Matilda Barton, Charles T. Barton, Anna B. Barton, William A. Barton, Sallie K. Barton, Kate Barton, and Minerva Barton. Shoemaker in Pendleton County in 1850. Master shoemaker in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000272800, p. 424.
